mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply (board_id, content, memberId) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.board_id boardId, r.content, m.nickName writerNickName, r.inserted, IF (m.id = #{memberId}, 1, 0) own FROM Reply r JOIN Member m ON r.memberId = m.id WHERE r.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY r.id
SELECT id, board_id boardId, content, memberId, inserted FROM Reply WHERE id = #{id}
